text: Steve Lawrence (born Sidney Liebowitz; July 8, 1935 - March 7, 2024) was an American singer, musician, and actor. He was best known as a member of a duo with his wife Eydie Gormé, known as "Steve and Eydie." The two appeared together since appearing regularly on Tonight Starring Steve Allen in the mid-1950s until Gormé's retirement.Biography from Las Vegas Online2003 Interview with Larry King, from a CNN website (web archive from Wayback Machine) He was raised of a Jewish faith.A Treasure You May Be Overlooking In June 2019, Lawrence was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.
